Blog.post: Hmmnx.. eLLoz aGaiN.. Today wake uP at 6:30am then bath Lia0x.. gO scHoOl aT abOut 7aM theN reaCh scHoOl oN tiMe.. scHoOl was bOrin 1sT 4 perIod F&N=> Teacher neBer cOme then PhysIC=> 1 perIod nIa.. tHen MaThs=> sTress.. sO haI haO lo.. TheN gO hOme LiaOx... cHanGe theN cOs faMily daY so me3t mUmmY aNd tHen eaT LuncH lIaOx.. gO sUpeRmaRt wIth hEr.. Then sHe gO hOme PrePare fOod.. TheN tOdaY paPa Bday.. TheN todaY paPas frIend "aH ma" keeP me aS gOd sOn.. Then hahax.. kInda Fun... aNd haIz.. reaLised sOmething oN mSN.. I dOnnO i HaPpy oR saD.. acTually PEiFeN Bluff me.. sHe nO sTead.. haIx.. NoW TheN sHe saY...dOnnO wadS my fe3lIng nOw toO.. MayBe i dOnnO.. And Then qUarReL wITh DeBoraH anD theN bUai gaM liaox..[NoT fwEn LiaOx]... TheN hMmNx.. TodaY scHooL theY caTch The FLASHER.. hahax.. TheN lIDat Lo.. JUs waNNa wIsh pApa a HAPPY BIRTHDAY and tHanK God-Ma fOR the ANg BaO!! HahaX.. $$$ LidDat Lo.. aFter aLL tHis dOnNo waNNa gO SNO toMolO maHx..

Today no go school agaIn.. Wah sicK men.. eaT wad oSo mOutH paIn.. Hmmnx.. ToMolo gotta gO scHoOl leR lo.. hahaz.. Ummnx.. Today Wah liaox.. 9:30am liddaT MeItIng caLL me.. :"AdIN, u all taKe cLass PoTo leR mahx?".. I saId :'hah?'in a sleepin tone.. then she ask.. u sleepin in class hah? i was lIke no at home.. FunnY lo.. Then sHe told me today got class PhOto taKin.. hahax.. TheN sHe saY nebEr go cOs waKe uP laTe.. suRprisIn isH tHaT BaOyI weNt.. hahax>> tOt sHe gOt MC tHen wiLL doN gO de.. hahaZ.. hmmNx. TheN waKe uP liaOx.. waTch TV.. Then aFter tHat 2pM liddaT meeT xIao xIn, Ah haO, AdrIan and Jessica lo.. Then hmmnx.. gO eaT leR LunCh tHen go HoMe.. sLacK.. plaY cOmputer.. sLeePx.. liddaT lo.. TomOlo wiLL be tHe oNli daY i gO scHooL tHis we3k.. hahax..

Today wake up late at 6:20am.. Then meet bao yi wanna go school together de.. But when we meet liao.. already 7:10am liaox.. kInda LaTe.. Then We Take cab till near school then i realise 7:20 liaox.. Then i say.. confirm late lo.. When the cab reach school we know we late liaox.. We tell the cab driver to go straight.. But he say traffic light.. Then I saw Mr Yeo patrolling.. then we both faster hide down.. The cab then move and turn.. We then decide to ponten lo.. So sianx... Went to take MC.. cos really sick mahx.. Then got 2 daes M.C!! Tomolo donno wanna go school mahx.. Hmmnx.. Quick shiok rite?? But i waN my vOice...

Today wake up at 11+am.. beri early liao hor... cos last nite sleep at 4+am lehx.. Hmmnx.. As usual.. Cos wan to go Ginna chalet so.. Bomb Baoyi's fone.. but she never hear the bomb.. Then gwen call me ask me wad time go.. Then we go together.. So we went to first K.C's chalet.. His Bdae chalet.. but we act we donno his Bdae... hahax.. Then, cause i beri tired so slack at the chalet and then eat liaox sleep... Then, saw leonard goin to ginna chalet so.. Say later then go lo.. But awhile later, Gwen say wan to go see who got smoke red de.. then change with he.. cos she wan menthol light de.. Go there liao.. go sit sit with weiming, Jun Hao, Ah bao, Ho E they all... Sit awhile ler go back sleep... After that... When heard that sz3 xuaN anD iaN they all here liaox.. so we quickly take our things go there... Beri bad rite? use K.C chalet as slacking area.. hahax.. I don tink he mind la.. So we ish run here run there lo... Then, go sit together and eat eat.. tok tok... Then laugh laugh.. BBQ.. then auntie so kind sia.. gib so much food.. until we beri full.. I tink Ian the most full de.. He eat like dustbin... 2plates of beehoon with curry chicken and potato... 5 to 6 oTah... 1 chicken wing... aLot rite?? Then eat liao.. we go cut cake.. But once cut finish liaox.. Baoyi papa call.. say he reach liaox.. So i ask if can tompang[on the way] me home.. Then ok lo.. Go home together... Then reach central liaox.. On the way home my papa call then he say he at kopitiam.. So i go find him.. Go home at about 12+1+ liddat lo.. Then go online.. Sleep at about 4+am lo.. Then damn tired...

It was National day whereby i suppose to hab ticket but in the end don't hab.. So sad.. and felt half sianz... The Gwen Msg me and ask how i gonna spend NDP.. I told her.. at home lo.. No tickets.. Then she say she hab.. Hahaz.. Then I can go lo.. Like siao liddat shout here and there.. hahaz.. Then I call MeiTing and Bao Yi.. Keepin bombing their call.. But cause they celebrate Baoyi Bday then go home late then sleep till like pig mahx.. So i go ahead and meet Gwen and go ourself... At the NDP we reserve sits for 6 ppl.. Then the others were like lookin at us.. hahaz.. but anyway.. Who CARES!! Hahaz... Then In the end, Meit ting and baoyi cannot join us.. cause they late.. Mus be at the yellow sector...The fireworks so nice it was jus right on top of us.. And when it spreads our sits were vibrating.. It was nice men.. And cause we were right infront of the LCD screen.. that even meiting at opposite can see us.. cos we stand on bench and was the tallest... Then after that we went to Kallang Airport and eat Wanton MEe... And hmmnx.. shared fried kway teow and char tao kueh.. Then all like tokin about how to use chopstick... Sho funny.. Cos they laugh at me donno how to use chopstick.. I LEARN LIAO K.. thou, it sux.. but hai hao la... hahaz.. Ummnx... After that then wan to go ginna chalet de.. but late liaox.. then sianx... and tired.. so we took bus 10 to tamp. and bus 81 back to pasir ris.. then go home.. MSN with Bao yi and then i went to oioi liaox.. Kinda fun day lo.. And hope that tomolo will hab a better and fun day...

I love this girl that i know her for 3 years. We have gone steady a year ago and i still can't forget her. Just a year ago, we broke up because we can't communicate well. I didn't care much at that time and just don't give a damn. But all this while, I can't forget her. Just recently, I saw her on the bus. She was talking to another guy by her side from the same school as her. I thoT he was her new steady. But she saId he isn't. I was happy as she still cares for me and ask how I've was doing. I starting messaging[sms-ing] her and ask her about her health. As she always have gastric problems and she always misses meal. Soon, i ask her to go steady again. I told her i wanna take care of her. She gave me a reply that she need to complete her O level first. I accepted and told her i was willing to wait. However, i admit i was impatient. A few days later, i ask her for her hand again, she then told me she was attached. I was angry and frustrated in my heart for her to keep this from me. I was very angry but I didn't want her to be sad. I told her that i was fine and ask her to rest assure that we will still be friends. I don't know what to do now. Feeling depressed and sad lately. Just hope something in my life will change as thingts aren't getting well lately.
